document_data.name: Clan Wardragon
document_data.symbol: A serpentine dragon wrapped vertically around a downward-pointing sword
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Wardragon''' was a family of [[human]]s who were dispersed across [[northwest Faer√ªn]]. Many of the Wardragons of [[Loudwater]] originally settled [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Notable members:
* [[Laroun]], early warlord of Waterdeep.
* [[Meloon Wardragon]], descendant of Laroun.
